section.title: SVF::SVFUtil::isa_impl< To, From, typename std::enable_if< std::is_base_of< To, From >::value >::type > Struct Template Reference

indexterm.primary: SVF::SVFUtil::isa_impl< To, From, typename std::enable_if< std::is_base_of< To, From >::value >::type >

para.para: Always allow upcasts, and perform no dynamic check for them.

section.section:
Detailed Description template<typename To, typename From> struct SVF::SVFUtil::isa_impl< To, From, typename std::enable_if< std::is_base_of< To, From >::value >::type >
Always allow upcasts, and perform no dynamic check for them.
The documentation for this struct was generated from the following file: include/Util/Casting.h
